source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT
    k.ID AS caseOfficerId,
    k.Name AS caseOfficerLogin,
    CASE
        WHEN k.Type = 0 
            THEN ISNULL(k.FirstName, '') + 
                 CASE WHEN k.FirstName IS NOT NULL AND k.LastName IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END +
                 ISNULL(k.LastName, '')
        ELSE ISNULL(k.Name, '') + ' (Group)'
    END AS caseOfficerName,
    k.MailAddress AS coEmailAddress
FROM dbo.Horizon_CaseReference AS cases
INNER JOIN dbo.DTree AS dtree 
    ON cases.CaseNodeId = dtree.DataID
INNER JOIN dbo.Horizon_TypeOfCase AS t 
    ON cases.CaseTypeId = t.ID
LEFT JOIN dbo.Horizon_vw_BIS_FirstCaseOfficer AS co 
    ON cases.CaseNodeId = co.CaseId
LEFT JOIN dbo.KUAF AS k 
    ON co.CaseOfficerId = k.ID
WHERE dtree.OwnerID <> -235834
  AND t.CaseworkType IN ('Appeal', 'CommonLand', 'Costs', 'Environment', 'RightsOfWay')
  AND cases.CaseUniqueId > 2999999
  AND k.ID IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY caseOfficerName ASC;
